descriptionHTML:
With sparkling diamonds around the bezel, Silver looks gorgeous on round as well as rectangular. Its silver properties will always convey dateless style and elegance. Silver Watch face for ladies can be customized in different color tones fitting your personal style and fashion.

◇ Timeless watch face dial
◇ Fabulous diamonds around the bezel

◇ Sophisticated color choices
◇ Customizable to your style

The crafted Tourbillon makes your smartwatch a stunning timepiece for every occasion. For more exclusive and fashionable women watch faces please see our exclusive collection on Google Play http://goo.gl/QOsOu4

Ladies luxury made in Germany.
